title: Leadership for innovation ecosystems
segmentation: Let's move on.
The next presentation is going to be made by Sonia Club Church.
She is in this environment in business environment in Slovenia, known as the manager who understands the soft element of the business.

Initiative is one month to month to month old, but of course it's based on more than 25 years of experience in in the business and the idea behind it is that ethical, social, responsible, creative people.
Mature people want to Co create one to contribute, and that's why we would like to find a new way how we can.
Involve them how we can all.
Affect on collective intelligence.
We've all experienced that the old approaches don't give us results anymore, and there's a need for new approaches.
We need to generate new ways of corporations, corporations.
We need to also to develop people awareness and.
Support system, thinkings and ethics.
And there's really a need for the change of organizations.
So that we can really use an exploit intelligence that we need that we have, and there's also basis basic idea behind this that each individual can be a leader.
And when I was talking about trying to find the new organizations new structures, this is not just idea.
This is also becoming an experiment.
For example, in three more we are practicing now molecular structures in some of the processes becausw we want to establish really dynamic, flexible, adaptive.
Organization where people are.
Making teams in very flexible way in some kind of self organize, organizing teams and this organization is open learning networked experimental.
Of course.
The basis here is that we are all leaders that we are all connected on one way.
On the other hand, also each of us is independent, but we want to be connected because we want to play.
In the same music.
We know that nobody, no one of us can play alone.
We need all to play and we need people that are driven by the vision, values and mission.
And really this is the big change from classical hierarchical structures to really distribute it.
Leadership.
Each individual can be a leader.
Of course, he or she must know herself for his himself very good.
What are the traits?
What are the potential water?
The talents, what his personal mission?
And of course, the knowing the skills, how to make relations with others, how could to connect with others is very important.
Also developed view of the world with entrepreneurship, innovative thinking, system thinking.
To understand how the company or organization is organized and how it works.
Of course, some expert knowledge is also needed.
Unt understanding how other subsystems are working and how we're all connected and how we are all interdependent.
And this is the idea here.
And this initiative goes for this.
We need leaders and leaders can be made.
Not just be born.
Thank you.
